# API Reference for cdktf.CosBackendProps

   CosBackendProps <a name="CosBackendProps" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps"></a>
  
  Stores the state as an object in a configurable prefix in a given bucket on Tencent Cloud Object Storage (COS).
  
  This backend supports state locking.
  
  Warning! It is highly recommended that you enable Object Versioning on the COS bucket to allow for state recovery in the case of accidental deletions and human error.
  
  Read more about this backend in the Terraform docs:
  https://www.terraform.io/language/settings/backends/cos
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  using HashiCorp.Cdktf;
  
  new CosBackendProps {
      string Bucket,
      string Acl = null,
      bool Encrypt = null,
      string Key = null,
      string Prefix = null,
      string Region = null,
      string SecretId = null,
      string SecretKey = null
  };
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.bucket">Bucket</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Required) The name of the COS bucket. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.acl">Acl</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) Object ACL to be applied to the state file, allows private and public-read. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.encrypt">Encrypt</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | (Optional) Whether to enable server side encryption of the state file. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.key">Key</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) The path for saving the state file in bucket. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.prefix">Prefix</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) The directory for saving the state file in bucket. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.region">Region</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) The region of the COS bucket. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.secretId">SecretId</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) Secret id of Tencent Cloud. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.secretKey">SecretKey</a></code> | <code>string</code> | (Optional) Secret key of Tencent Cloud. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `Bucket`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="Bucket" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.bucket"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Bucket { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Required) The name of the COS bucket.
  
  You shall manually create it first.
  
  ---
  
  ## `Acl`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Acl" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.acl"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Acl { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) Object ACL to be applied to the state file, allows private and public-read.
  
  Defaults to private.
  
  ---
  
  ## `Encrypt`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Encrypt" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.encrypt"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public bool Encrypt { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* bool
  
  (Optional) Whether to enable server side encryption of the state file.
  
  If it is true, COS will use 'AES256' encryption algorithm to encrypt state file.
  
  ---
  
  ## `Key`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Key" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.key"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Key { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) The path for saving the state file in bucket.
  
  Defaults to terraform.tfstate.
  
  ---
  
  ## `Prefix`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Prefix" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.prefix"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Prefix { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) The directory for saving the state file in bucket.
  
  Default to "env:".
  
  ---
  
  ## `Region`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="Region" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.region"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string Region { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) The region of the COS bucket.
  
  It supports environment variables TENCENTCLOUD_REGION.
  
  ---
  
  ## `SecretId`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="SecretId" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.secretId"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string SecretId { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) Secret id of Tencent Cloud.
  
  It supports environment variables TENCENTCLOUD_SECRET_ID.
  
  ---
  
  ## `SecretKey`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="SecretKey" id="cdktf.CosBackendProps.property.secretKey"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  public string SecretKey { get; set; }
  ```
  
  - *Type:* string
  
  (Optional) Secret key of Tencent Cloud.
  
  It supports environment variables TENCENTCLOUD_SECRET_KEY.
  
  ---
